fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £100 The Hollins Hey Hotel (01516 911171) in Wallasey is a splendid Victorian villa with magnificent views over Liverpool Bay. On 27 and 28 March a one-night stay costs £17.38pp based on two adults and two children under 10 sharing a room. Under £400 Relax for a week in Puerto Pollensa, Mallorca. Departing on 1 April with Portland Holidays (08705 002200; www.portland-direct.co.uk) for £345pp including flights and the three-star Hotel Uyal. Under £500 Sri Lanka for seven nights at the four-star Blue Water costs £439pp including breakfast and flights from Heathrow with Trailfinders (0845 058 7000; www.trailfinders.com). Must book by 31 March. A sporty week in Kos with Mark Warner Holidays (0870 770 4222; www.markwarner.co.uk) costs from £471pp departing Gatwick on 4 May. Tennis, waterskiing, sailing and aerobics are all on offer. Under £1,000 British Airways Holidays (0870 243 3406; www.ba.com/holidays) offers Bermuda for £986pp departing between 27 and 31 March with seven nights at the quiet and friendly three-star Rosedon Hotel with breakfast and flights from London Gatwick. Under £1,100 Shop like a supermodel in Milan with the Alexander and Stuart (020 7351 6644; www.alexanderandstuart.com) personal shopping package. Three nights at the Bulgari Hotel costs £1,090pp with dinner and dancing at Robert Cavalli's hip hangout. Personal shoppers and chauffeurs available on request.
